uriTemplate.description: Supplies a resolvable URI to a remote resource (or resource fragment).

varBase.description: The base URI to which the variable name can be appended to retrieve the definition of the variable as a JSON Schema fragment.

variables.description: This object contains one key per substitution variable in the templated URL.  Each key defines the schema of one substitution variable using a JSON Schema fragment and can thus include things like the data type of the variable, enumerations, minimum values, maximum values, etc.

rel.description: The type or semantics of the relation.

type.description: A hint indicating what the media type of the result of dereferencing the link should be.

hreflang.description: A hint indicating what the language of the result of dereferencing the link should be.

title.description: Used to label the destination of a link such that it can be used as a human-readable identifier.

created.description: Date of creation of the resource pointed to by the link.

updated.description: Most recent date on which the resource pointed to by the link was changed.
